I think I have been having a problem with this mod. I love how it downs the countdown thing and everything, but every time I tried to do a launch with this, after waiting about 45 to 60 seconds for the whole countdown thing, as soon as I hit the spacebar my rocket would destabilize and fall apart with the boosters taking off and ramming into my main stage. The thing is that if I launch as soon as I get out onto the launch pad, everything works as it should. I've tried it with different boosters and different radial decouplers. I've tried it with small rockets and large rockets, and the same thing happens all the time. Launch right away without countdown, everything works. Activate countdown and then launch when it is over, everything blows up. It is getting kind of frustrating.

This is a mod based on this one.

It works slightly differently, but the principle is the same. It also allows for adding more countdowns by just putting in a new folder.

... as soon as I hit the spacebar...

That's your problem. The ReadMe/instructions for the mod should have been clear on this I believe - when the countdown reaches zero it stages your rocket. So if you're pressing spacebar at 0 then your rocket is being double-staged, which generally means your boosters are being jettisoned and thus blow up on the pad and take your rocket with them

Quick test - works perfectly for me in 1.0

This mod (just like Chatterer) adds so much to the game

Once I am used to it I find I cannot play without

These two give KSP more soul

Again - thanks Athlonic
